body.p:
To his Excelency Thos E Bramlette
Govener of the State of Kentucky
At the May (Called Term) of the metcalfe Circuit there was Judgment Rendered against Preston W Lee for $60 (Sixty dollars) & the cost of the action, for keeping a Tipling House,

Now we whose names are hereunto annexed state that the said Lee is an old & poor man, with considerable family to support, & is not able to pay said fine, without perhaps sacrafising some of the Little means that he has for the suport of said family, We state the above facts for the purpose of asking the interposition of The Executive clemancy which is vested in you to Release said Lee of the fine

Wm H Conyers
S, R, Higgason
W J Cott
J M Lendon
